title: Deleted Event
description: A `deleted event` follows semantics that are exactly equivalent to the semantics described by the [`delete activity`](https://www.w3.org/TR/activitystreams-vocabulary/#dfn-delete), except for one difference. The `delete activity` can be used in imperative contexts, however, the `deleted event` can only be used in passive contexts.
